title: supertrendio
author: supertrendio
content: Are you tired of missing out on profitable trading opportunities? Say hello to SuperTrend AI ‚Äì the game-changing trading tool that's designed to revolutionize your trading strategy. With its cutting-edge features and advanced algorithms, SuperTrend AI is the key to unlocking consistent trading success.**What Makes SuperTrend AI Stand Out?****Spotting Precise Trend Beginnings:** With pinpoint accuracy, SuperTrend AI identifies the start of trends, giving you a head start in capturing profitable moves early on.**Optimal Entry and Exit Points:** Say goodbye to second-guessing your trades. SuperTrend AI ensures you enter and exit positions at the perfect moments, maximizing your gains and minimizing risks.üéØ **Peak Performance at Turning Points:** Whether it's a potential reversal or a market peak, SuperTrend AI excels at capturing those critical moments where profits can skyrocket.‚öôÔ∏è **Long and Short Trading Capabilities:** Seamlessly execute long and short trades with confidence. SuperTrend AI empowers you to make the most of both bullish and bearish market conditions.üåê **Compatibility with Leading Platforms:** Thanks to its webhook support, SuperTrend AI seamlessly integrates with platforms like Wundertrading, enabling automatic execution of trades for a hassle-free trading experience.**Why Choose SuperTrend AI?****Data-Driven Precision:** Backed by advanced algorithms and thorough analysis, SuperTrend AI is your strategic ally in the unpredictable world of trading.üìà **Proven Results:** Countless traders have already experienced the incredible benefits of SuperTrend AI. Don't just take our word for it ‚Äì witness the difference in your own trading journey.üîí **Secure and Reliable:** Rest assured that your trading data and strategies are in safe hands. SuperTrend AI prioritizes security and reliability, allowing you to focus solely on making informed trading decisions.üìö **User-Friendly Interface:** No complex setups or steep learning curves. SuperTrend AI is designed with traders of all levels in mind, ensuring you can harness its power with ease.Ready to take your trading to the next level? Embrace the future of trading with SuperTrend AI. Unlock the potential for consistent profits and stay ahead of the market trends.Visit https://supertrend.io to learn more and experience the difference for yourself!---

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Checking the internet for information about your platform I found none and checking Whois about your site information the platform is just over a week oldQuoteDomain:supertrend.ioRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On:2023-08-12Expires On:2024-08-12Updated On:2023-08-17https://www.whois.com/whois/supertrend.ioYou will have to prove how good your Supertrend AI indicator is which is worth $499 the telegram user testimonials are not a good indication.And It's better to replace the Youtube version with an English version to better understand by the majority how your indicator works unless you are offering this to your local.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: $500 to use the product, only buyable through Telegram, likely fake reviews from some randomly generated Telegram user. Yeah, no offense but your product looks like a scam as of now. There are tons of AI-powered trading platform nowadays that offers a free trial, free package, cheaper premium package, and so on. Even if you don't scam them, you're certainly overpriced and not worth the money for most users.

comments.author: Synchronice
comments.body: Quote from: supertrendio on August 22, 2023, 08:20:24 PMReady to take your trading to the next level? Embrace the future of trading with SuperTrend AI. Unlock the potential for consistent profits and stay ahead of the market trends.Visit https://supertrend.io to learn more and experience the difference for yourself!---Weren't you able to handle astonishing profits? Or why do you sell such an amazing tool here for such a low price? If you can tae your trading to the next level and constantly grow your profit, I bet your budget will increase day by day and you'll be able to profit $300 in just some minutes, so what's the point of selling this tool here? I'll tell you, you are a scammer who tries to use buzzwords to lie to people and take their hard-earned money. That's all who you are!

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: Synchronice on August 23, 2023, 06:17:31 PM...I bet your budget will increase day by day and you'll be able to profit $300 in just some minutes, so what's the point of selling this tool here? I'll tell you, you are a scammer who tries to use buzzwords to lie to people and take their hard-earned money. That's all who you are!Many people who offer to teach people how to make money from crypto trading or Forex or any other fancy word they come up with most times earn their piece from those who subscribe to their training if they are not outright scammers.They put in so much effort creating ads on Instagram and YouTube and try to make it as catchy as possible to attract their victims.I am also all up for deletion of obvious scams like this one which adds nothing to discussions. I am sure no one would make a case against it.- Jay -

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Can you actually show us how your so-called supertrend AI tool works on live video? We need to look at win rates and maybe some back test results of different trading pairs once we have seen how it performs for a number of trades.So many free supertrend strategy community scripts on tradingview as far as I know. They have nothing to do with AI.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: with such good features $499 is way too cheap let alone a lifetime license. and you say that many traders have tried these tools, but with the newly created domain and website appearance like it was made by a junior high school student, not too sure that the tools you offer are truly credible and can be relied upon by users. at least you can offer a trial to users so that we here can have a little trust in your tools, but if that's not there, that's just like you're a scammer.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: moneystery on August 24, 2023, 03:23:57 PMwith such good features $499 is way too cheap let alone a lifetime license.We have no way of telling if the features are all good unless someone is credible enough to vouch that the features are good because OP did not offer a vouch.¬†Quoteand you say that many traders have tried these tools, but with the newly created domain and website appearance like it was made by a junior high school student, not too sure that the tools you offer are truly credible and can be relied upon by users.That is his own words those testimonials on his webpage are not credible enough only a vouch from an independent tester Quote at least you can offer a trial to users so that we here can have a little trust in your tools, but if that's not there, that's just like you're a scammer.Unfortunately for OP he never came back to defend the tool he is selling, so we can conclude that he is not serious and confident on his tool.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on August 23, 2023, 07:06:45 AM$500 to use the product, only buyable through Telegram, likely fake reviews from some randomly generated Telegram user. Yeah, no offense but your product looks like a scam as of now. There are tons of AI-powered trading platform nowadays that offers a free trial, free package, cheaper premium package, and so on. Even if you don't scam them, you're certainly overpriced and not worth the money for most users.The price that appears on the site is 29 dollars, if it was previously 500 dollars, then the price difference between them is very large, and I do not think that the user has a long-term marketing plan. These services need trust, and trust comes from providing free recommendations and doing some free offers before paying users. $29 is a reasonable price if the analyzes are good and cannot be found with a quick search on the Internet. It is better to have a daily or weekly subscription.Quote from: robelneo on August 22, 2023, 11:16:05 PMYou will have to prove how good your Supertrend AI indicator is which is worth $499 the telegram user testimonials are not a good indication.And It's better to replace the Youtube version with an English version to better understand by the majority how your indicator works unless you are offering this to your local.I noticed that the Turkish language is present, and even there, 500 dollars is not a small amount. It seems that he was eager to make a quick profit.

comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on August 27, 2023, 12:19:48 PMQuote from: joniboini on August 23, 2023, 07:06:45 AM$500 to use the product, only buyable through Telegram, likely fake reviews from some randomly generated Telegram user. Yeah, no offense but your product looks like a scam as of now. There are tons of AI-powered trading platform nowadays that offers a free trial, free package, cheaper premium package, and so on. Even if you don't scam them, you're certainly overpriced and not worth the money for most users.The price that appears on the site is 29 dollars, if it was previously 500 dollars,The moment I saw $500 mentioned I instantly looked at the website, for real?But yeah, probably changed it to 29$m after he saw the replies, he was logged in after joniboini mentioned the price and he probably realized nobody is going to pay that much upfront for, again, what would you get for those 29/month?Quote from: Synchronice on August 23, 2023, 06:17:31 PMWeren't you able to handle astonishing profits? Or why do you sell such an amazing tool here for such a low price? Do you know how you can get rich from books that teach you how to win the lottery? You SELL them!¬† But still curious about one thing, he has a video linked in:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0kfsMr8b68gIt's way too small to analyze on a smartphone but as I'm squinting at whatever is scrolling there, doesn't he have at a point like 400 closed trades and then just 17 with the profit factor going to 1.017?

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: supertrendio on August 22, 2023, 08:20:24 PMAre you tired of missing out on profitable trading opportunities? Say hello to SuperTrend AI ‚Äì the game-changing trading tool that's designed to revolutionize your trading strategy. With its cutting-edge features and advanced algorithms, SuperTrend AI is the key to unlocking consistent trading success.Another AI based tool to help us in trading ¬†This trend of using the terminology of AI to sell products that are nowhere near to Artificial Intelligence is increasing alarmingly.Ahhh AI does not know how to properly sell the tool but to use a platform with no escrow. You need to try a little better to make the fake SuperTrend AI tool to look real.Quote from: stompix on August 27, 2023, 12:41:29 PMThe moment I saw $500 mentioned I instantly looked at the website, for real?Was it 500$ for a month before ? Look like this is his first time trying to scam people ¬†A super trending AI tool with super price

comments.author: Synchronice
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on August 27, 2023, 12:41:29 PMDo you know how you can get rich from books that teach you how to win the lottery? You SELL them!¬† Yes, that's right especially when some people might be so dumb that they'll buy two books to get double rich Quote from: stompix on August 27, 2023, 12:41:29 PMBut still curious about one thing, he has a video linked in:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0kfsMr8b68gIt's way too small to analyze on a smartphone but as I'm squinting at whatever is scrolling there, doesn't he have at a point like 400 closed trades and then just 17 with the profit factor going to 1.017?That video means absolutely nothing, you have to have a look at the description of the product. He talks about his SuperTrend AI like an amazing tool that is going to help you to get the most out of both, bullish and bearish market. Word AI itself is a buzzword like blockchain used by many to scam people. I bet he isn't using quantum computers and haven't built some superficial intelligence. QuoteüéØ **Peak Performance at Turning Points:** Whether it's a potential reversal or a market peak, SuperTrend AI excels at capturing those critical moments where profits can skyrocket.‚öôÔ∏è **Long and Short Trading Capabilities:** Seamlessly execute long and short trades with confidence. SuperTrend AI empowers you to make the most of both bullish and bearish market conditions.üåê **Compatibility with Leading Platforms:** Thanks to its webhook support, SuperTrend AI seamlessly integrates with platforms like Wundertrading, enabling automatic execution of trades for a hassle-free trading experience.Read it carefully, it just says that it's going to confidently profit you always. That's impossible!

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m77b9XdWgf0Andhttps://twitter.com/rokhladnik/status/1695709420968087619I could keep going but those 2 links cover it.Anybody who has a real trading bot is going to keep it secret, use it, make a ton of money, and then retire to their own private island.But, all these people have is buzzword bingo to get people to send them money so they can scam and run away.It is fun to watch them try new things to scam people however.-Dave

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: Synchronice on August 23, 2023, 06:17:31 PMWeren't you able to handle astonishing profits? Or why do you sell such an amazing tool here for such a low price?You just summed up an entire generation of people who think they can get rich by playing with charts on a computer. All these gurus suddenly have the need to tell the norm how to get rich, like them*. Yep, this is what rich people do. ¬† (Enter subscription bullshit...) I'm genuinely curious who's buying this shit. When will the people comprehend that to gain profit in trading consistently you need to know more than the norm? An AI can't do anything when the only input it has is a chart, followed by mountains of articles with zero journalist integrity. * except from the part where they don't do what they themselves suggest
